xml:
Climagest<tm tmtype="reg"/> 2-mg Indications and dose

Menopausal symptoms (if symptoms not controlled with lower strength)

By mouth

  • Adult

    1 tablet daily for 16 days, blue tablet to be taken and started on day 1 of menstruation (or at any time if cycles have ceased or are infrequent), then 1 tablet daily for 12 days, white tablet to be taken, subsequent courses are repeated without interval.

 Clinical medicinal product information Clinical medicinal product information
